page.title: 16THE SHOP & WOODCARVERS I.A.
page.content: Mrs.Rudd owns and runs the village shop in Ingleby Arncliffe.Her mother started the shop 48 years ago in her front room.When the shop and post office at Ingleby Cross closed 14 years ago,Mr.and Mrs.Rudd took over the P.O. licence and continued to run it as part of their shop in Ingleby Arncliffe.However the post office has retained the name 'Ingleby Cross' and this can be seen on the sign outside. Mr. Hodgson is a carpenter and woodcarver who owns a workshop and showroom at Ingleby Cross. He lives in Middlesbrough and has worked here for 2 years. He uses many different types of wood to make articles such as garden seats, tables, babies cradles, plates and egg-timers.A high proportion of his work is made to order.
